  • Log
  • ng_logAddCallback()

function ng_logAddCallback()

Add a command to be called back when a log entry is added.

function ng_logAddCallback pCallbackName, pLocation
Parameters
TypeNameDescription
pCallbackName Name of the command to call.
pLocation Long id of the script that contains the callback command pCallbackName.
Description

The signature of the callback command is the following:
on myCallback pErrorLevel, pMessage
replace "\n" with cr in pMessage
replace "&commas;" with "," in pMessage
... Do what you have to do ...
end myCallback

Return

The id of the callback in the callback list.

Warning

Callbacks are not checked!

Notes
The call of the callback is asynchronous (sended in time) in order to not block NativeGeometry.
Also, callbacks are called inside a try handler, and no error are reported in order to not block Revolution while a resizing operation.
See also

ng_logDeleteCallback
ng_logGetCallbackList
ng_logGet
